# Modified
## Filename
IExternalLoginInfoManager.cs
## Relative Path
inzibackend.Web.Core\Authentication\External\IExternalLoginInfoManager.cs
## Language
C#
## Summary
The modified file defines an interface for managing external login information with methods to retrieve usernames from claims and user data.
## Changes
A minor formatting change: the tuple method's parameter list now has a space before the opening parenthesis.
## Purpose
The interface supports authentication by handling login info retrieval through external means, enhancing security and flexibility in an ASP.NET Zero application.
